source:
%%sql
-- Build position_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.position_dim (
    PositionID,
    PositionCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)


SELECT
    Row_Number() over (Order by T1.PositionID) AS PositionID,
    T1.PositionID  AS PositionCode, -- cell AH
    First(PositionName)  AS Description, -- cell AI
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PositionID,'.'), IFNULL(FIRST(T1.PositionName),'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive


FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_historic T1 -- CHECK
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
GROUP BY T1.PositionID
